    Class Description
    AbstractSlingStartMojo
    Base class for all slingstart mojos.
    AbstractStartStopMojo

    Attach the model archive as a project artifact.
    AttachSlingStartModel
    Attach the model as a project artifact.
    BuildConstants  
    ControlListener
    Control listener.
    DependencyLifecycleParticipant
    Maven lifecycle participant which adds the artifacts of the model to the dependencies.
    FeatureModelConverter  
    FeatureModelConverter.FeatureFileEntry  
    GenerateResourcesMojo  
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on slingstart-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn slingstart:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    JarArchiverHelper  
    JSONFeatures  
    Launcher  
    LauncherCallable
    A callable for launchpad an instance
    LauncherMBean
    The launcher MBean interface.
    LaunchpadEnvironment
    Common settings for all launchpad instances.
    Main
    Main class for launching Apache Sling.
    ModelPreprocessor  
    ModelPreprocessor.Environment  
    ModelPreprocessor.ProjectInfo  
    ModelUtils  
    PackageMojo
    Create a Sling quickstart package (either JAR or WAR) based on the referenced model.
    PomArtifactVersionResolver
    Provisioning artifact resolver that tries to resolve artifacts in provisioning file without version (LATEST) against the dependencies defined in the maven project.
    PomVariableResolver
    Provisioning variable resolver that supports setting or overriding variables via POM properties.
    PortHelper
    Simple helper class to find a new port.
    PreparePackageMojo
    Prepare the packaging of the Sling quickstart artifact (either JAR or WAR).
    ProcessDescription
    A running launchpad process.
    ProcessDescriptionProvider
    A singleton which is responsible to provide ProcessDescriptions
    ProjectHelper  
    RepositoryMojo
    Create a Maven repository structure from the referenced artifacts in the model.
    ServerConfiguration
    A server configuration
    StartMojo
    Start one or multiple launchpad instance(s).
    StopMojo
    Stop one or multiple running launchpad instance(s).
    Substitution
